languages.text: {n}...пустая гильза. Вы узнаете, от какого она оружия — наверное, ворон пробрался на бортовое стрельбище и застал Сестру Ардженту за тренировкой.{/n}
{n}...an empty ammo casing. You recognise the weapon — {petname} must have sneaked into the training chamber in the middle of Sister Argenta's routine session.{/n}

languages.text: {n}…空の弾薬薬莢だ。この武器には見覚えがある。{petname}はきっと、シスター・アルジェンタの訓練中に射撃場に忍び込んだのだろう。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...an empty ammo casing. You recognise the weapon — {petname} must have sneaked into the training chamber in the middle of Sister Argenta's routine session.{/n}

languages.text: {n}... eine leere Munitionshülse. Du erkennst die Waffe – {petname} muss sich in Schwester Argentas Routineübungen in der Trainingskammer geschlichen haben.{/n}

{n}... eine leere Munitionshülse. Du erkennst die Waffe – {petname} muss sich mitten in Schwester Argentas Trainingsstunde auf den Schießstand geschlichen haben.{/n}

languages.text: {n}... une douille vide. Vous savez quel type d'arme requiert de telles douilles. {petname} a dû s'inviter dans la salle d'entraînement lors de l'une des sessions d'Argenta.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...an empty ammo casing. You recognise the weapon — {petname} must have sneaked into the training chamber in the middle of Sister Argenta's routine session.{/n}

{n}... une douille vide. Vous savez quel type d'arme requiert de telles douilles. {petname} a dû s'inviter sur le stand de tir lors de l'une des sessions d'entraînement d'Argenta.{/n}

languages.text: {n}... un casquillo de bala vacío. Reconoces el arma a la que pertenece; {petname} debe de haberse colado en la cámara de entrenamiento cuando la hermana Argenta se encontraba en su sesión rutinaria.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...an empty ammo casing. You recognise the weapon — {petname} must have sneaked into the training chamber in the middle of Sister Argenta's routine session.{/n}

{n}... un casquillo de bala vacío. Reconoces el arma a la que pertenece; {petname} debe de haberse colado en la galería de tiro cuando la hermana Argenta se encontraba en plena sesión de entrenamiento.{/n}

languages.text: {n}……那是个空弹壳，你认出了那枚子弹。{petname}肯定是趁阿洁塔修女进行日常训练的时候，偷偷溜进了训练室。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...an empty ammo casing. You recognise the weapon — {petname} must have sneaked into the training chamber in the middle of Sister Argenta's routine session.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}……那是个空弹壳，你认出了那枚子弹。{petname}肯定是趁阿洁塔修女进行日常训练的时候，偷偷溜进了训练室。{/n}
{n}……那是个空弹壳。你认出了是哪把枪的弹壳，{petname}肯定是趁阿洁塔修女进行训练的时候，偷偷溜进了射击场。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Boş bir mermi kovanı. Ait olduğu silahı anımsıyorsun. {petname}, Rahibe Argenta'nın eğitim seansı sırasında gizlice odaya girmiş olmalı.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...an empty ammo casing. You recognise the weapon — {petname} must have sneaked into the training chamber in the middle of Sister Argenta's routine session.{/n}
